name: Tankgrounds
description:
Tankgrounds is an early stage development project made by us-Icebound Development-as our first game project.  The game is currently still in development and there may be bugs and or difficulties.  Tankgrounds is a top-down 2D "shooter" where you control a tank and destroy waves of enemy tanks and occasional bosses.  How far can you get?

Current Features:

  • Over 20 waves of enemies, each getting harder as you go
  • A fully working health and damage system for the player
  • Pathfinding for the enemy tanks
  • Hand drawn pixel art
  • Music
  • 2 unique bosses

Planned Features:

  • More Visual effects
  • More Sound effects
  • More Maps/Gamemodes
  • CO-OP
  • PvP Multiplayer
  • Scene transitions
  • More Tank types and waves
  • Tank powerups
